## Homework #2

Chunk out the messages when a package is loaded.

```{r, message=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

```

The rest of the homework

```{r}
a <- 103

b <- 3

a > b 

ls()

rm(list=ls())

ls()
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
